name: Small map, big plans
description:
Welcome to "Small map, big plans"!

This game has been made for the trijam#169, which theme was "Overpopulation". Made in 4H46.

Your goal is to manage the space so that people can live there. There will be more and more people needing a place to live, but the space available won't increase. Pretty much like it does on our planet.

xxx

How do I play?

You have to click on a tile then click on a free spot on the board. There's three types of tiles:
-Lake
-Field
-House

A house can host ten persons. To do so, a house has to be surrounded with at least two fields and one lake. Once the house fulfills these conditions, its appearance changes and the population number increases.

You can place the first tile wherever you want, but the next ones are to be linked to what you already played. The tiles come in a random order.

Once you'll have reached the target number of population, you'll have a new board to fill with a greater target number.

xxx

If you enjoyed the game or want to give us constructive advice, write us a comment!
(and if you're taking part in the game jam, a vote would be appreciated!)
